name: Trapped: Lost Riddles
description:
Something’s not quite right.. Where are those demonic screams coming from? The historic mansion on Baker Drive is supposed to be where the town’s hot new game show is being hosted tonight. But something has gone terribly wrong. It seems that the game show is actually a haunted house nightmare … and members of the local community are TRAPPED inside! Can you help save them before it is too late?

Each level is a new episode of a haunted fate. Girl scouts locked in cages? Grandma locked in the attic? Hurry to hunt the scenes for Hidden Objects and free the hostage game show contestants! Earn coins to unlock the next level! There are tons of different ways to search for hidden objects and save the day - you’ll love to master this free hidden object mystery game!

Download now and spin the wheel on every level for awesome new challenges!

-- HIDDEN OBJECT TRAPPED! GAME FEATURES --

Free Seek and Find Game
Spin the Wheel for tons of awesome different game modes!
Replay each level tons of different ways!
Collect Daily Counts
Share your progress on Facebook and other social media
Save your energy up or use gems and play all day!
Addictive free hidden object game!
Spooky game show hosts and eerie background music!

The clock is ticking… It’s time to begin your next (and hopefully not last) Hidden Object haunted hunt!
